Create a TPS file from a stimlist

Source: R/write_tps.R
write_tps.Rd

Create a TPS file from a stimlist

write_tps(stimuli, path_to_tps = NULL)

Arguments

stimuli

list of class stimlist
path_to_tps

optional filename to save TPS file

Value

text of tps file

Examples

# set path_to_tps to save to a file
demo_stim() %>%
  write_tps() %>%
  cat()
